MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ StrokeDashArray { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };
member this.StrokeDashArray : System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的集合，这些值指示用于勾勒形状轮廓的虚线和间隙样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of values that indicate the pattern of dashes and gaps that is used to outline shapes.

value.span: 指定虚线和间隙样式的 值的集合。

span.span: A collection of values that specify the pattern of dashes and gaps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个都 指定了与笔的相对的短划线或间隙的长度 。Each in the collection specifies the length of a dash or gap relative to the of the pen. 例如，的值 `1` 会创建一个短划线或间隔，使其长度与 (正方形) 的笔的宽度相同。For example, a value of `1` creates a dash or gap that has the same length as the thickness of the pen (a square). 集合中的第一项（位于索引0处）指定短划线的长度;第二项位于索引1处，指定间隔的长度。The first item in the collection, which is located at index 0, specifies the length of a dash; the second item, which is located at index 1, specifies the length of a gap. 具有偶数索引值的对象指定短划线;具有奇数索引值的对象指定间距。Objects with an even index value specify dashes; objects with an odd index value specify gaps.

summary.span: 获取或设置 枚举值，该值指定在 的顶点处使用的联接类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration value that specifies the type of join that is used at the vertices of a .
One of the enumeration values for

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在没有顶点的元素（如元素上）设置此属性，则此属性不起作用 。This property has no effect if you set it on an element that has no vertices, such as on a element. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在形状的顶点处使用的几个不同的联接。The following example shows several different joints used at the vertices of a shape. [!code-xaml[drawingwithshapeelements#PolylineExample1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingWithShapeElements/CS/polylineexample.xaml#polylineexample1)] 下图显示了不同的线条联接。The following illustration shows the different line joins. ![线条联接示例。](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "线条联接示例。")![Example of line joins.](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "Example of line joins.")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double StrokeMiterLimit { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.StrokeMiterLimit : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对斜接长度与 元素的 的一半之比的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets a limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the of a element.

value.span: 对斜接长度与 元素的 之比的限制。

span.span: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to the of a element.

value.span: 此值始终是大于或等于 1 的正数。

span.span: This value is always a positive number that is greater than or equal to 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接通过使两条联接线的端点形成一个角。当两个线段在锐角相交时，斜接可能会超出该路径描边的线条的粗细。A miter forms a corner by beveling the ends of two joined lines.When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
